io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie

Class JwtCookieConfigurationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie.JwtCookieConfigurationProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.util.Toggleable, io.micronaut.http.cookie.CookieConfiguration, TokenCookieConfiguration, AccessTokenCookieConfiguration, JwtCookieConfiguration

    @Requires(condition=CookieBasedAuthenticationModeCondition.class) @Requires(property="micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie.enabled",notEquals="false",defaultValue="true")
 @ConfigurationProperties(value="micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie")
public class JwtCookieConfigurationProperties
extends java.lang.Object
implements JwtCookieConfiguration
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
